title: S earned by a teammate but no chest?
body: I want to earn a chest on Ashe - i haven't earned a chest on her yet and am able to earn 4 chests this month. Her profile panel says I haven't already earned a chest so i should be able to receive one. I've played 3 games with her where a teammate has earned an S or S- and therefore i should be entitled to a chest. Is it that i need to earn the S myself or am i being a noob? xD

replies.body: Were you in a premade party with the teammate? If a teammate gets an S grade, you need to be in a premade party with them in order to earn a chest.

Ahhhhh - no i wasn't in a premade party. 
Ill see if i get a chest that way then.
Thanks guys xD

I'm with Zombiemaster on this!  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, the teammate actually has to be in a premade party with you to be eligible.  Let me know if that clears things up!
